author: niallp
msg: Applying patch for Bug 30300 to LinkTag supplied by Brian Bonner

author: niallp
msg: Changes to make "lazy" dynabeans or POJO beans easier to plug in.
"Lazy" DynaBeans will hopefully soon be released with Beanutils 1.7.0. These changes will make it easier to plug either a regular JavaBean or a "lazy" DynaBean into struts as an ActionForm.
* FormBeanConfig now sets up the properties of DynaBeans which use a MutableDynaClass.
* FormBeanConfig now handles POJO beans by wrapping the specified bean using WrapDynaBean and the new BeanValidatorForm.
* RequestUtils has been changed so that properties starting with "org.apache.struts" are not attempted to be populated in the ActionForm
